h3.a: Continual Learning Packet Delivery and Pick-Up Process

div.p:
Due to health concerns with the transmission of paperwork between parents and also staff members, we will be limiting the number of personal connections. We will not be collecting packets that are completed by students.
Completed packets will not be returned to the school. We would like your cooperation on how to show teachers the completion of the work. Options may be to take a picture or scan the packet . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Continual Learning Packet Delivery and Pick-Up Process

div.p: Driver's Ed. students and parents. At this time summer's Driver's Ed. has been put on a hold. At this time we don't know if there will be Driver's Ed. or not. We are waiting on direction from the state. Once we have more information we will pass that along to all involved. Thanks for your patience.

a.aria-label: Read more about Drivers Education Update

h3.a: Parents & Families of our EJSHS Students

div.p:
I have a few updates in regards to the continued learning process for our EJSHS Students. Our teachers met Monday via zoom meetings and they are starting their planning process for student continual learning. Their planning days will continue through next Monday. We are tentatively planning to start our student educational connections next Tuesday, March 31 st .
We know . . .

a.aria-label: Read more about Parents & Families of our EJSHS Students
